Title: 41725 - How to Find Your Dream Home
Direction: 500 words. Create a guide that will help someone find their dream home, using 3-6 subheaders. Talk about things like picking the right neighborhood, deciding how much space you need, and finding the style of house that you love the most. Your placement site is a blog that discusses real estate in Louisville, KY. So keep this audience of new home shoppers in mind when writing. You can link to your target URL in any section, by suggesting creating a checklist of everything you want your dream home to have.
